def calculateMonthlyPayment(principal: Double, interestRate: Double, termYears: Int): Double =
  val monthlyRate = interestRate / 12.0 / 100.0
  val numberOfPayments = termYears * 12
  principal * monthlyRate / (1 - Math.pow(1 + monthlyRate, -numberOfPayments))

def getMonthlyPayment(optPrincipal: Option[Double], optRate: Option[Double], optYears: Option[Int]): Option[Double] =
  for
    principal <- optPrincipal
    rate <- optRate
    years <- optYears
  yield calculateMonthlyPayment(principal, rate, years)

case class ScannedTicket(eventId: Int, seat: String)
def parseScannedTicket(qr: String): Option[ScannedTicket] =
  val split = qr.split("-")
  for
    idStr <- split.lift(0)
    seat <- split.lift(1)
    id <- idStr.toIntOption
  yield ScannedTicket(id, seat)

def validateTicketExpiration(qrScanTime: Option[Long], expirationEpoch: Long): Boolean =
  qrScanTime.exists(_ <= expirationEpoch)

def participantFromQR(qrString: String): Option[String] =

    .filter(_.contains("-"))
    .map(_.split("-")(1))

def scanAndValidateSeat(qr: String): Option[String] =
  Option(qr)
    .flatMap { data =>
      val seat = data.split(":").lift(1)
      seat
    }
    .filter(_.matches("[A-Z]\d+"))
